category.name: Change Management
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CM_track_variant_condition_changes
preference.preference_description:
Defines the change types for which variant BOM changes can be tracked. Valid Values: Accepts multiple strings as values; each string must contain a valid Teamcenter change type using the following syntax:
CM_note_types_to_track= Change-Type1:Note-Type1,Note-Type2 Change-Type2:Note-Type1,Note-Type4
For example, a valid value is: ChangeNotice:UG Geometry,UG NAME
